verses.text: \w The|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Lemuel|strong="H3927"\w*—\w the|strong="H1697"\w* revelation \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H4428"\w* mother \w taught|strong="H3256"\w* \w him|strong="H4428"\w*:

“Oh, \w my|strong="H4100"\w* \w son|strong="H1248"\w*! Oh, \w son|strong="H1248"\w* \w of|strong="H5088"\w* \w my|strong="H4100"\w* womb! Oh, \w son|strong="H1248"\w* \w of|strong="H5088"\w* \w my|strong="H4100"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*!

Don’t \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H2428"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* women, nor \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w which|strong="H2428"\w* \w destroys|strong="H4229"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w It|strong="H8354"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H8354"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w Lemuel|strong="H3927"\w*, \w it|strong="H8354"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H8354"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, nor \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w princes|strong="H7336"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* say, ‘Where \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*?’

\w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w law|strong="H2710"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w pervert|strong="H8138"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w justice|strong="H1779"\w* due \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H7941"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* ready \w to|strong="H5414"\w* perish, \w and|strong="H3196"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H2142"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w his|strong="H2142"\w* \w poverty|strong="H7389"\w*, \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w his|strong="H2142"\w* \w misery|strong="H5999"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w Open|strong="H6605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mute, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cause|strong="H1779"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* left desolate.

\w Open|strong="H6605"\w* \w your|strong="H6605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w righteously|strong="H6664"\w*, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* serve \w justice|strong="H6664"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w needy|strong="H6041"\w*.”

\f + \fr 31:10 \ft Proverbs 31:10-31 form an acrostic, with each verse starting with each letter of the Hebrew alphabet, in order.\f*\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w worthy|strong="H2428"\w* woman? \w For|strong="H2428"\w* \w her|strong="H4672"\w* value \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w above|strong="H7350"\w* \w rubies|strong="H6443"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w her|strong="H3820"\w* \w husband|strong="H1167"\w* trusts \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H3820"\w*. \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w lack|strong="H2637"\w* \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w gain|strong="H7998"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3808"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w harm|strong="H7451"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3709"\w* \w seeks|strong="H1875"\w* \w wool|strong="H6785"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w flax|strong="H6593"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w works|strong="H6213"\w* eagerly \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H6213"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.

She \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w merchant|strong="H5503"\w* ships. She brings \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w afar|strong="H4801"\w*.

\w She|strong="H6965"\w* \w rises|strong="H6965"\w* \w also|strong="H5750"\w* \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w food|strong="H2964"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w portions|strong="H2706"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* servant \w girls|strong="H5291"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3709"\w* \w considers|strong="H2161"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w buys|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*. \w With|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, \w she|strong="H3709"\w* \w plants|strong="H5193"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*.

She \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* \w her|strong="H2296"\w* \w waist|strong="H4975"\w* \w with|strong="H2296"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w and|strong="H5797"\w* makes \w her|strong="H2296"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* \w strong|strong="H5797"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3588"\w* perceives \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H5504"\w* \w merchandise|strong="H5504"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* profitable. \w Her|strong="H5504"\w* \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* doesn’t \w go|strong="H3518"\w* \w out|strong="H3518"\w* \w by|strong="H3915"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3709"\w* lays \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w distaff|strong="H6418"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w hold|strong="H8551"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w spindle|strong="H6418"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3709"\w* opens \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w arms|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*; yes, \w she|strong="H3709"\w* \w extends|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w needy|strong="H6041"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*.

She \w makes|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* herself carpets \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w tapestry|strong="H4765"\w*. \w Her|strong="H6213"\w* \w clothing|strong="H3830"\w* \w is|strong="H3830"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* purple.

\w Her|strong="H3045"\w* \w husband|strong="H1167"\w* \w is|strong="H8179"\w* respected \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H3045"\w* \w sits|strong="H3427"\w* amongst \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* land.

She \w makes|strong="H6213"\w* \w linen|strong="H5466"\w* \w garments|strong="H5466"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w sells|strong="H4376"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w delivers|strong="H5414"\w* sashes \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w merchant|strong="H3669"\w*.

\w Strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w dignity|strong="H1926"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H3117"\w* \w clothing|strong="H3830"\w*. She \w laughs|strong="H7832"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* come.

\w She|strong="H5921"\w* \w opens|strong="H6605"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*. Kind \w instruction|strong="H8451"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3808"\w* \w looks|strong="H6822"\w* \w well|strong="H6822"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w ways|strong="H1979"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* her \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* doesn’t \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w idleness|strong="H6104"\w*.

\w Her|strong="H1984"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* call \w her|strong="H1984"\w* blessed. \w Her|strong="H1984"\w* \w husband|strong="H1167"\w* \w also|strong="H1121"\w* \w praises|strong="H1984"\w* \w her|strong="H1984"\w*:

“\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* noble \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w excel|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*.”

\w Charm|strong="H2580"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H8267"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*; \w but|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w fears|strong="H3373"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*! \w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*!
